(Your not worth the time it takes to fight with you a coward with little 
honor Ks. This is going to Be Liono Last post for a while I'm moving. Note 
did not read my mail just getting this done.)

Liono exits the Cr chamber Iooks Prowl and Iron "Iron your in charge for a 
while Stay sharp and Prowl don't be afraid to give her a hand from time to 
time. Also it is OK to kill your enemies don't make the mercy the mistake I 
did. Also if you guys win the war and I haven't returned go home without me 
I'll make back sometime. Stay out of my  quarters until I get back which will 
when I find out about this vok technology these can't be the only traces." 

Tigerhawk Laughs "When we find out about this vok technology" 

Liono looks shocked "what your coming too?"

Tigerhawk grins  "With your luck you'll get into trouble like always."

Liono looks Prowl "Tell the others something cocky and say I said it and give 
this to Key." Hands a box to prowl ((I.E Yanshosh cut and paste this next 
part because odds of Blue checking her mail are slim and none.))

In the box there is two things a Ring with my Mom gave me this to give to the 
person I planned to spend all of my days with and a Holocube.

The holocube cuts on to Keys touch turns into a full sized Liono Prime it 
Speaks "if your wondering when I'll  or if I'll be back Key stand up hold 
arms spread your arms a little wider As long as you do this the holograms 
steps in between her arms and hugs her and kiss her on the forehead I have a 
home to return to so I'll be back unless you want to come with me. The 
Holocube shows a Map and a red beacon appears somewhere in Japan. Liono looks 
at "This is where I'll be.We are a team so don't you dare get killed on me. 
The Ring is a Signal put it on If your ever in trouble I'll be on my way in a 
flash just turn the ring to make the Lions touch. ((Send a private mail to 
Yanshosh@... telling him and he'll tell me.))  I Love you very much. 

Tigerhawk looks at Liono "the Vok technology isn't really why you left 
nobody's here I want the truth." 

Liono laughs "you saw past that huh I have to get stronger there something 
out there I feel it coming its a lot stronger than any threat we faced so far 
I just hope I make back in time."   

Tigerhawk looks at Liono "This is something you might want to share."

Liono look at Tigerhawk "I don't have enough information to spook the team 
all I know is he will have Black Wings."  

                                       As the two walk off into the horizon.
